seo.title: 37 Trillion — The Community of One
seo.description: A video-first introduction to the Community of One: 37 trillion cells, one pilot.

hero.title: You are a Community of One.
hero.subtitle: 37 trillion cells. One pilot. A modern way to understand stewardship, measurement, and purpose.

sections.title: The 37 Trillion
sections.blurb: You are a living civilization. The work is learning the truth of it—and becoming a better pilot of it.

sections.title: Measure What Matters
sections.blurb: Multi-omic measurement turns vague wellness into navigable signals—so progress becomes visible and repeatable.

sections.title: 144 Pilots
sections.blurb: A mentorship ecosystem where real tools and real examples help people discover who they were created to be—and serve from that truth.
